classic_command.label: Classic - command
classic_command.tooltip:
Command to play the classic "Rock, Paper, Scissors".
Empty to disable

wordFile.label: Localization
wordFile.tooltip:
Name of the file containing localisation
English, English

Default: local_en.txt

reward.label: Winner gets currency
reward.tooltip:
Amount of Chatbot currency to give when someone wins against the bot.
Default: 100

user_cooldown.label: User cooldown
user_cooldown.tooltip:
In seconds - Cooldown per user preventing abuse.
Default: 60
